title: In-Situ Crosslinked Matrix enables Efficient and Mechanically Robust Organic Solar Cells with Frozen Nano-Morphology and Superior Deformability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02724H, Paper
Wei Song, Zhenyu Chen, Congqi Lin, Pilan Zhang, Dinghong Sun, Weifu Zhang, Jinfeng Ge, Lin Xie, Ruixiang Peng, Daobin Yang, Quan Liu, Yifei Xu, Ziyi Ge
Flexible organic solar cells (F-OSCs) with excellent mechanical robustness and high performance are in high demand for their applications in wearable devices. However, considering their high-power conversion efficiency, achieving mechanical...
